TopicTitle: Space Station capable of docking with legit parts and ksp lp

Articles.Content:
Hey guys, I decided to try my luck at a kerbal space program lp and I posted my first video today. As my first project I decided to launch a space station capable of docking (crudely). It uses landing legs to hitch on to a piece of the satellite (I hope, I haven't actually tested this in 0.16). In my next video I will (hopefully) rendezvous with the satellite and show off (hopefully) legit docking in ksp. I hope you would be kind enough to check out my video and if you like it subscribe or like.

My channel: https://www.youtube.com/user/spunky244224?feature=watch
Pretty cool. Its really similar to the docking design I use in my own world.
